alert.note: Alert for Andrews; Borden; Dawson; Gaines; Howard; Martin; Scurry (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued January 14 at 3:35AM CST until January 14 at 8:00PM CST by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON CST /11 AM MST/ TODAY TO 8 PM CST /7 PM MST/ THIS EVENING FOR RELATIVE HUMIDITY OF 15 PERCENT OR LESS, 20 FT WINDS OF 20 MPH OR MORE, AND VERY HIGH TO EXTREME FIRE DANGER FOR SOUTHEAST NEW MEXICO PLAINS, PARTS OF THE PERMIAN BASIN, AND WESTERN LOW ROLLING PLAINS... The National Weather Service in Midland/Odessa has issued a Red Flag Warning for dry and windy conditions, which is in effect from noon CST /11 AM MST/ today to 8 PM CST /7 PM MST/ this evening. The Fire Weather Watch is no longer in effect. * AFFECTED AREA...Gaines, Dawson, Borden, Scurry, Andrews, Martin, Howard, Chaves Plains, Eddy Plains and Lea. * TIMING...Friday afternoon and early evening. * WINDS...West to northwest 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 35 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 12 percent. * RFTI...3 to 4 near critical.
info.instruction: A combination of gusty winds, low relative humidity and warm temperatures will increase potential for starts.

area.areaDesc: Andrews; Borden; Dawson; Gaines; Howard; Martin; Scurry
